document_data.name: Oota
document_data.mainbody: '''Oota''' was a self-styled mayor within the [[Lost Peaks]].
document_data.Activities: Oota managed a secret [[shadovar]] village for captured [[Chosen]], despite being herself a captive. She had dealings with the maid and [[Harper]] spy [[Tharra (Harper)|Tharra]].
document_data.History: In [[1486 DR]], Oota agreed to meet the disguised [[Dahl Peredur]], that offer his help to made an escape plan.
